Quarter: The fiscal quarter in which the data was collected, e.g., Q1 2025, Q2 2025. This helps in tracking changes over time.
Onboarding_Time_Spent_on_Training: The percentage of total employee onboarding time that is dedicated to training activities. This metric is crucial for understanding the efficiency and focus of the onboarding process.
Total_Onboarding_Hours: The total number of hours spent on onboarding new employees during the quarter. This provides context for the percentage of time spent on training.
Number_of_New_Hires: The number of new employees who started the onboarding process in the specified quarter. This helps in understanding the scale of onboarding activities.
Training_Hours_Per_Hire: The average number of hours spent on training per new hire. This metric helps in assessing the intensity and depth of training provided.
